## `Close` {#standard-close}

Closes the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
Close(boolean saveChanges)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` saveChanges | Specifies whether to save any changes made to the project. The default is `false`. |

### Example {-}

``` {.lua}
-- Open a project from the user's "Documents" folder and save its scores summary
consentForm = StandardProject(Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Documents) ..
                              "Consent Form.rsp")
consentForm:ExportReport(ReportType.ReadabilityScoresTabularReport,
                Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Documents)() ..
                "Review/ConsentScoresSummary.htm")
-- Close, don't bother saving.
consentForm:Close(false)
```
:::
